perturbation.original_text: SHBV agrees that it shall manufacture and supply to W2E (or as it shall direct), W2E Equipment, in each case in accordance with the terms of the manufacturing agreement ("Manufacturing Agreement") to be entered into by the Parties on or following the entry into this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: SHBV agrees that it shall manufacture and supply to W2E (or as it shall direct), W2E Equipment, in each case in accordance with the terms of the production contract ("Manufacturing Agreement") to be entered into by the Parties on or following the entry into this Agreement.
perturbation.explanation: Changing 'manufacturing agreement' to 'production contract' introduces ambiguity as the contract consistently refers to 'Manufacturing Agreement' as a defined term. Using 'production contract' interchangeably without defining it creates uncertainty and contradicts the defined term.

perturbation.original_text: The Parties agree that they shall on or following the date of this Agreement, enter into the Manufacturing Agreement which shall govern the manner and terms upon which they will co-operate and fulfil their respective obligations to each other relating to the W2E Equipment and the SHBV Technologies (including the quantity of SHBV Boilers, primary chambers, secondary chambers and economisers that SHBV shall supply, their price and timetable for delivery).
perturbation.changed_text: The Parties agree that they shall on or following the date of this Agreement, enter into the Supply Arrangement which shall govern the manner and terms upon which they will co-operate and fulfil their respective obligations to each other relating to the W2E Equipment and the SHBV Technologies (including the quantity of SHBV Boilers, primary chambers, secondary chambers and economisers that SHBV shall supply, their price and timetable for delivery).
perturbation.explanation: Changing 'Manufacturing Agreement' to 'Supply Arrangement' creates confusion. The contract defines and refers extensively to the 'Manufacturing Agreement'. Using 'Supply Arrangement' without definition implies a different agreement with potentially different terms, contradicting the established framework.

perturbation.original_text: This Agreement (together with the Manufacturing Agreement and any project schedule entered into by the Parties as contemplated herein) constitutes the entire agreement between the Parties in relation to its subject matter, and replaces and extinguishes all prior agreements, draft agreements, arrangements, undertakings, or collateral contracts of any nature made by the Parties, whether oral or written, in relation to such subject matter.
perturbation.changed_text: This Agreement (together with the Manufacturing Undertaking and any project schedule entered into by the Parties as contemplated herein) constitutes the entire agreement between the Parties in relation to its subject matter, and replaces and extinguishes all prior agreements, draft agreements, arrangements, undertakings, or collateral contracts of any nature made by the Parties, whether oral or written, in relation to such subject matter.
perturbation.explanation: Replacing 'Manufacturing Agreement' with 'Manufacturing Undertaking' creates a contradiction because the contract consistently refers to the defined term 'Manufacturing Agreement'. Introducing 'Manufacturing Undertaking' without definition makes it unclear whether it refers to the same agreement or a separate one, disrupting the clarity of the entire agreement clause.
